AltName.entry: WICKER PHARMACY AND WICKER MOBILITY SHOP

Desc.entry: Late night pharmacy. Services include a free registration scheme where items not in stock are delivered to customers, Wicker Health Newsletter, home delivery, prescription collection from surgery, 'Wicker Meds-on-Time' system for those who have problems managing their medication. Clinics are held in the pharmacy's consultation rooms covering physiotherapy, podiatry, addiction treatment and wound treatment. The mobility shop offers sales and service of equipment for disabled people.

DisabledAccess.entry: Lowered counter and prescription signing point for wheelchair users

Fax.entry: 07872 059915 (Emergency mobile no for use in power cuts, floods, etc)

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Sat 8.30am-10pm; Sun and Bank Holidays 10am-8pm; Christmas Day 3-5pm
